reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Realistically this is a budget travellers place. The people are warm and accomodating albeit that the rooms are extremely basic. If you want a fridge they will just move one into your room which is great but don't expect much on the furnishing and fittings front. Anyone who has been to Boracay will know that you will spend most time outside of the room anyway and so if it is only a bedroom you want then this is your place.
reviews.title: Very Basic but Accomodating
SUPER EXPENSIVE For SUPER PEAK DATES
reviews.text: We travelled there during Chinese New Year and found that the prices were hiked up (but I can see that this is just natural law of supply and demand as everywhere else was full). At least these people offer free wifi which some more expensive hotels will want to charge for.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Finally we foreshortened our stay for personal reasons through no fault of the residence. They werre accomodating enough to allow us to do this without any penalty which was very gracious of them and for which we are thankful for..
reviews.title: Perfect hotel for perfect vacations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you have plans of staying in to this resort during SUPER PEAK SEASON ( Chinese New Year, Holy Week and the like), you might wanna consider checking out other Resorts WORTH the Price. The Peak Rates of this resorts is exaggerated ( more than DOUBLE compared to their HIGH or LOW Season ).
reviews.title: Little gem
